mapper.select: SELECT EF.REPORT_ID, EF.EQUIPMENT_ID, EF.USERNAME, EF.REPORT_DATE, EF.DESCRIPTION, EF.FAULT_STATUS, EF.RESOLVED_AT, E.NAME AS equipmentName, E.LOCATION AS equipmentLocation FROM EQUIPMENT_FAULT EF JOIN EQUIPMENT E ON EF.EQUIPMENT_ID = E.EQUIPMENT_ID
SELECT REPORT_ID, EQUIPMENT_ID, USERNAME, REPORT_DATE, DESCRIPTION, FAULT_STATUS, RESOLVED_AT FROM EQUIPMENT_FAULT WHERE REPORT_ID = #{reportId}
SELECT REPORT_ID, EQUIPMENT_ID, USERNAME, REPORT_DATE, DESCRIPTION, FAULT_STATUS, RESOLVED_AT FROM EQUIPMENT_FAULT WHERE EQUIPMENT_ID = #{equipmentId} ORDER BY REPORT_DATE DESC

SELECT EF.REPORT_ID, EF.EQUIPMENT_ID, EF.USERNAME, EF.REPORT_DATE, EF.DESCRIPTION, EF.FAULT_STATUS, EF.RESOLVED_AT, E.NAME AS equipmentName, E.LOCATION AS equipmentLocation FROM EQUIPMENT_FAULT EF JOIN EQUIPMENT E ON EF.EQUIPMENT_ID = E.EQUIPMENT_ID WHERE EF.FAULT_STATUS = #{faultStatus} ORDER BY EF.REPORT_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EQUIPMENT_FAULT (EQUIPMENT_ID, USERNAME, REPORT_DATE, DESCRIPTION, FAULT_STATUS) VALUES (#{equipmentId}, #{username}, #{reportDate}, #{description}, #{faultStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT FR.REPORT_ID AS REPORTID, FR.EQUIPMENT_ID AS EQUIPMENTID, E.NAME AS EQUIPMENTNAME, FR.USERNAME, FR.DESCRIPTION, FR.FAULT_STATUS AS FAULTSTATUS, FR.REPORT_DATE AS REPORTDATE, DATE_FORMAT(FR.REPORT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REPORTDATESTR, FR.RESOLVED_AT AS RESOLVEDAT, DATE_FORMAT(FR.RESOLVED_AT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS RESOLVEDATSTR FROM EQUIPMENT_FAULT FR JOIN EQUIPMENT E ON FR.EQUIPMENT_ID = E.EQUIPMENT_ID ORDER BY FR.REPORT_DATE DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}
